description: A man in his 50s dies after being shot when he opened his house door to a caller in Ballyfermot.
title: Ballyfermot shooting: Murder investigation begins after shooting
title_page: Ballyfermot shooting: Murder investigation begins after shooting - BBC News
maintext: Garda¨ª (Irish police) said the victim, who was 55, sustained a number of gunshot wounds and was pronounced dead at the scene, which has been cordoned off for forensic examination.
